success.title: Felicitations !

success.thankYou: Merci de faire confiance a SOS-Expat

errors.quotaExhausted: Vous avez atteint votre quota mensuel
errors.updatePaymentMethod: Veuillez mettre a jour votre moyen de paiement

changePlan.a: Oui, vous pouvez upgrader ou downgrader a tout moment. Le changement prend effet immediatement.

trial.a: Vous beneficiez de 30 jours d'essai avec 3 appels IA gratuits. Aucune carte de credit requise.

quota.q: Que se passe-t-il si j'atteins mon quota ?
quota.a: Vous pouvez soit attendre le mois suivant pour un reset, soit upgrader vers un plan superieur.

cancel.a: Oui, vous pouvez annuler a tout moment. Vous conserverez l'acces jusqu'a la fin de votre periode payee.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.manageDescription: Manage your subscription and track your usage

trial.title: Free Trial
trial.description: Discover the AI assistant for free
trial.callsExhausted: You have used all your trial calls

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.subtitle: Select the plan that fits your needs

cancelModal.message: You will keep access until {date}. You can resubscribe at any time.

success.emailSent: A confirmation has been sent to your email

errors.noSubscription: You don't have an active subscription
errors.quotaExhausted: You have reached your monthly quota

changePlan.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

trial.q: How does the free trial work?
trial.a: You get 30 days of trial with 3 free AI calls. No credit card required.

quota.q: What happens if I reach my quota?
quota.a: You can either wait for the next month for a reset, or upgrade to a higher plan.

cancel.a: Yes, you can cancel anytime. You'll keep access until the end of your paid period.

changePlan.a: Si, puedes mejorar o degradar en cualquier momento. Los cambios tienen efecto inmediato.

trial.a: Tienes 30 dias de prueba con 3 llamadas IA gratuitas. No se requiere tarjeta de credito.

quota.q: Que pasa si alcanzo mi cuota?
quota.a: Puedes esperar al mes siguiente para un reinicio, o mejorar a un plan superior.

cancel.a: Si, puedes cancelar cuando quieras. Mantendras el acceso hasta el final de tu periodo pagado.

subscription.title: Abonnement

plans.subtitle: Wahlen Sie den Plan, der Ihren Bedurfnissen entspricht

quota.resetInfo: Das Kontingent wird zu Beginn jedes Monats zuruckgesetzt

cancelModal.title: Abonnement kundigen?
cancelModal.message: Sie behalten den Zugang bis zum {date}. Sie konnen sich jederzeit wieder anmelden.

success.title: Herzlichen Gluckwunsch!
success.subtitle: Ihr {plan}-Abonnement ist jetzt aktiv

errors.quotaExhausted: Sie haben Ihr monatliches Kontingent erreicht

changePlan.a: Ja, Sie konnen jederzeit upgraden oder downgraden. Anderungen werden sofort wirksam.

trial.a: Sie erhalten 30 Tage Testzeit mit 3 kostenlosen KI-Anrufen. Keine Kreditkarte erforderlich.

quota.q: Was passiert, wenn ich mein Kontingent erreiche?
quota.a: Sie konnen entweder auf den nachsten Monat fur einen Reset warten oder auf einen hoheren Plan upgraden.

cancel.a: Ja, Sie konnen jederzeit kundigen. Sie behalten den Zugang bis zum Ende Ihres bezahlten Zeitraums.

changePlan.a: Sim, voce pode fazer upgrade ou downgrade a qualquer momento. As mudancas tem efeito imediato.

trial.a: Voce tem 30 dias de teste com 3 chamadas IA gratuitas. Cartao de credito nao necessario.

quota.q: O que acontece se eu atingir minha cota?
quota.a: Voce pode esperar o proximo mes para uma reinicializacao ou fazer upgrade para um plano superior.

cancel.a: Sim, voce pode cancelar quando quiser. Voce mantera o acesso ate o final do seu periodo pago.

quota.resetInfo: Kvota sbrasyvaetsya v nachale kazhdogo mesyatsa

cancelModal.title: Otmenit' podpisku?
cancelModal.message: Vy sokhranite dostup do {date}. Vy mozhete podpisat'sya snova v lyuboye vremya.

success.title: Pozdravlyaem!
success.subtitle: Vasha podpiska {plan} teper' aktivna
success.accessTo: Teper' u vas est' dostup k:

changePlan.a: Da, vy mozhete uluchshit' ili ponizit' plan v lyuboye vremya. Izmeneniya vstupayut v silu nemedlenno.

trial.a: Vy poluchayete 30 dney s 3 besplatnymi II-vyzovami. Kreditnaya karta ne trebuetsya.

quota.q: Chto budet yesli ya dostignu kvoty?
quota.a: Vy mozhete podozhdat' sleduyushchego mesyatsa dlya sbrosa ili uluchshit' plan.

cancel.q: Mogu li ya otmenit' v lyuboye vremya?
cancel.a: Da, vy mozhete otmenit' kogda ugodno. Dostup sokhranitsya do kontsa oplachennogo perioda.

aiAssistant.askQuestion: Zadayte vopros o vashikh klientakh-ekspatakh, administrativnykh protsedurakh ili poprosite sovet.

upgradeModal.title: Kvota ischerpana
upgradeModal.message: Vy dostigli limita vashego plana. Uluchshite podpisku dlya prodolzheniya ispol'zovaniya II-assistenta.

cancelModal.title: Apni sadasyta radd kare?
cancelModal.message: Ap {date} tak pahunch banaiye rakhenge. Ap kabhi bhi phir se subscribe kar sakte hai.
cancelModal.endsOn: Apki sadasyta {date} ko samapt hoti hai

reactivate.title: Apni sadasyta punah sakriy kare
reactivate.message: Apki sadasyta samanya roop se jari rahegi.

success.title: Badhai ho!
success.subtitle: Apki {plan} sadasyta ab sakriy hai
success.emailSent: Pushtii apke email par bheji gayi
success.thankYou: SOS-Expat par bharosa karne ke liye dhanyavad

errors.noSubscription: Apke pas koi sakriy sadasyta nahi hai
errors.quotaExhausted: Apne masik kota pura kar liya
errors.loadFailed: Apki sadasyta load karne me asmarth
errors.updatePaymentMethod: Kripya apna bhugtan tarika update kare

changePlan.q: Kya main plan badal sakta hu?
changePlan.a: Ha, ap kabhi bhi upgrade ya downgrade kar sakte hai. Badlav turant lagu hote hai.

trial.q: Muft trial kaise kaam karta hai?
trial.a: Apko 3 muft AI call ke saath 30 din ka trial milta hai. Credit card avashyak nahi.

quota.q: Agar main kota tak pahunch jau to kya hoga?
quota.a: Ap reset ke liye agle mahine ka intezaar kar sakte hai, ya uchh plan me upgrade kar sakte hai.

cancel.q: Kya main kabhi bhi radd kar sakta hu?
cancel.a: Ha, ap kabhi bhi radd kar sakte hai. Bhugtan avadhi ke ant tak pahunch bani rahegi.

aiAssistant.title: AI Sahayak
aiAssistant.subtitle: Apke grahako ki madad ke liye vyaktigat sahayak
aiAssistant.howCanIHelp: Main apki kaise madad kar sakta hu?
aiAssistant.askQuestion: Apne expat grahako, prashasnik prakriyao ke baare me saval puche ya salah le.

tips.title: Sujhav
tips.tip3: AI web par khoj sakta hai

upgradeModal.title: Kota samapt
upgradeModal.message: Apne apne plan ki seema puri kar li hai. AI sahayak ka upyog jari rakhne ke liye upgrade kare.

errors.communicationError: AI ke saath sanchar me truti
errors.noMessageToRetry: Punah prayaas ke liye koi sandesh nahi

quota.title: Istikhdam al-dhaka' al-istina'i
quota.resetInfo: Yatim i'adat ta'yin al-hissa fi bidayat kul shahr

cancelModal.title: Ilgha' ishtirakak?
cancelModal.message: Satahfadh bi-l-wusul hatta {date}. Yumkinak al-ishtirak majaddadan fi ay waqt.

success.title: Tahanina!
success.subtitle: Ishtirakak {plan} nasht al-an
success.emailSent: Tam irsal ta'kid ila baridak al-iliktruni

changePlan.a: Na'am, yumkinak al-tarqiya aw al-takhfid fi ay waqt. Al-taghyirat tasri fawran.

trial.a: Tahsul 'ala 30 yawman ma'a 3 mukalamat dhaka' istina'i majjaniya. La tahtaj bitaqat i'timan.

quota.a: Yumkinak al-intidhar li-l-shahr al-tali li-l-i'ada, aw al-tarqiya li-khitta a'la.

cancel.q: Hal yumkinuni al-ilgha' fi ay waqt?
cancel.a: Na'am, yumkinak al-ilgha' fi ay waqt. Satahfadh bi-l-wusul hatta nihayat fatratik al-madfu'a.

aiAssistant.title: Musa'id al-dhaka' al-istina'i
aiAssistant.subtitle: Musa'idak al-shakhsi li-musa'adat 'umala'ik
aiAssistant.askQuestion: Itrah su'alan 'an 'umala'ik al-mughtaribin, al-ijra'at al-idariya, aw utlub nasiha.

tips.title: Nasa'ih
tips.tip3: Yumkin li-l-dhaka' al-istina'i al-bahth fi al-internet

upgradeModal.title: Tam istinfad al-hissa
upgradeModal.message: Wasalt li-hadd khittatik. Qum bi-l-tarqiya li-ishtirak a'la li-muwasilat istikhdam musa'id al-dhaka' al-istina'i.

errors.communicationError: Khata' fi al-tawasul ma'a al-dhaka' al-istina'i

subscription.title: Dingyue
subscription.manageDescription: Guanli nin de dingyue bing genzong shiyong qingkuang

trial.title: Mianfei shiyong
trial.expired: Nin de shiyong qi yi jieshu
trial.callsExhausted: Nin yi yongwan suoyou shiyong tonghua

plans.title: Xuanze nin de fang'an
plans.subtitle: Xuanze shihe nin xuqiu de fang'an

cancelModal.title: Quxiao nin de dingyue?
cancelModal.message: Nin jiang baoliu fangwen quanxian zhidao {date}. Nin keyi suishi chongxin dingyue.
cancelModal.endsOn: Nin de dingyue jiang yu {date} jieshu

reactivate.title: Chongxin jihuo nin de dingyue
reactivate.message: Nin de dingyue jiang zhengchang jixu.

success.title: Gongxi!
success.subtitle: Nin de {plan} dingyue xian yi jihuo
success.emailSent: Queren youjian yi fasong dao nin de youxiang

errors.trialExpired: Nin de shiyong qi yi jieshu
errors.updatePaymentMethod: Qing gengxin nin de zhifu fangshi

changePlan.a: Shi de, nin keyi suishi shengji huo jiangji. Gengai liji shengxiao.

trial.a: Nin ke huode 30 tian shiyong qi he 3 ci mianfei AI tonghua. Wuxu xinyongka.

quota.q: Ruguo wo dadao peie hui zenyang?
quota.a: Nin keyi dengdai xia ge yue chongzhi, huo shengji dao genggao de fang'an.

cancel.a: Shi de, nin keyi suishi quxiao. Nin jiang baoliu fangwen quanxian zhidao fufeiqr jieshu.

aiAssistant.title: AI Zhushou
aiAssistant.subtitle: Nin de geren zhushou, bangzhu nin de kehu
aiAssistant.askQuestion: Xunwen guanyu nin de waiji kehu, xingzheng chengxu de wenti, huo xunqiu jianyi.

upgradeModal.title: Peie yi yongwan
upgradeModal.message: Nin yi dadao fang'an xianzhi. Shengji dao genggao de dingyue yi jixu shiyong AI zhushou.
